properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 7 at 10:45PM EST until January 8 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
...GUSTY WINDS AND ELEVATED SEAS CONTINUE THROUGH WEDNESDAY...

.Gusty west to northwest winds behind a cold front will gradually
decrease overnight, then increase some during the day Wednesday.
Seas have peaked this evening and will slowly subside late tonight
through Wednesday. Winds and seas expected to drop below advisory
levels for all waters Wednesday night.

* WHAT...West winds 20 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and rough
waters.

* WHERE...Pamlico Sound.

* WHEN...Until 10 PM EST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST WEDNESDAY... ...GALE WARNING IS CANCELLED
